mapper.select: select t2.sex,t2.work_name,t2.birth_date,t2.place_name,t1.user_name,t1.card_id,t1.certificate_type,t1.certificate_num, t1.certificate_time,t1.expiry_date from exam_certificate_info t1,user_info t2 where t1.card_id=t2.pnum and t1.certificate_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
